Uses of Interface
com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.dispatching.EventBus

  • Packages that use EventBus 
    Package Description
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.dispatching
    Provides the EventBus interface, which simplifies creating batches of events and dispatching them collectively into the system.
    com.opencredo.concursus.domain.events.filtering.bus  
    com.opencredo.concursus.mapping.events.methods.proxying
